item.title: I've Passed CKAD Exam
item.author: vvelikodny@gmail.com (Vitaly Velikodnyi)
item.description: Today I’ve received email from : Congratulations! You have successfully completed Certified Kubernetes Application Developer (CKAD). Click the link below to view and download your certificate. It took me about 1 week to review all thing either I already know or forgot, train different setups on Kubernetes.
